item.title: A look at HAProxy native Prometheus metrics
item.description: HAProxy 2.0 contains, among other improvements, the ability to expose Prometheus metrics natively. As I am building HAProxy 2.0 and 2.1 rpm’s, I wanted to try it out and move away from the haproxy_exporter. While the haproxy_exporter is developed by the Prometheus team, and therefore a high quality exporter, there is good reasons to move to the HAProxy native Prometheus exporter: Performance New metrics Operations (no need to manage an exporter + the up metric represents haproxy) Security (no need to expose the stats csv) Metrics Gone but can be calculated better with queries:
